thread.title: A Corbyn victory in the Labour leadership battle would be a disaster
thread.title_full: A Corbyn victory in the Labour leadership battle would be a disaster

author: Allister Heath
title: A Corbyn victory in the Labour leadership battle would be a disaster
text: Economics A Corbyn victory in the Labour leadership battle would be a disaster If Jeremy Corbyn became leader of the Labour Party, it would become acceptable again to call for nationalising vast swathes of industry, for massively hiking tax and for demonising business A Corbynite Labour Party would herald a return to the ultra-confrontational 1980s Photo: Rex Features
